<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clarity Goggles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2314)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 146 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) The counteract check from a pair of clarity goggles uses the item's level to determine the degree of success._

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn eyepiece

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Clarity goggles_ feature faceted lenses that filter your surroundings from several slightly different angles at once, giving you a sharper picture of them. While wearing the goggles, you gain a +1 item bonus to visual Perception checks.
